data.title: I would do this cruise every time I go to Asheville!
data.text: JC and Zack were terrific.  They offered tours of the breweries at each stop (although not everyone participated).  The samples were terrific.  I asked a couple of times for a sample of something that wasn't on their flights and they always managed to get it for me.  They clearly have good relationships with the breweries and that helped make it good.  We were on the short bus - and we got to know most of the folks in our group.  It was very friendly (and more and more so as we moved through the samples!).  I had a great time.  Well worth the cost of admission.

data.title: Will made this tour!
data.text:
Will (our tour guide) made this fun experience memorable. From his wide ranging knowledge of all things Asheville, to the in depth conversations about craft beer & craft beer culture here in Asheville, you will not be disappointed by Asheville Brews Crews & their knowledgeable, professional staff.

Cheers y'all!

data.title: Zack made this the best!
data.text: We did the tour with Zack yesterday and he was awesome!!! We had such a great time! He gave us a really good explanation on the beer making process and was very knowledgable. All of the breweries were great and beer delicious. I highly recommend doing this!!! Thanks again Zack for such a fun day!

data.title: More of a shuttle than a tour
data.text:
I visited Asheville for the first time and was very excited to see the breweries today. I've been on brew tours where I live in the northeast and they are awesome. Unfortunately today's tour wasn't a great experience. The "guide" never gave a tour of how beer was made at all, he didn't tell us about each beer, and he didn't tell us about the breweries except the first place. 
The guide never introduced himself by name or asked any of the 30 of us where we were from, etc. We went to 3 breweries and it took a very long time to get to the first one- Pisgah. We did hear one person speak at Pisgah which was interesting, but it wasn't anything educational about beer. If we didn't make friends with other people on the tour we would have been really bored. Not what I was expecting- it wasn't a tour! No understanding of the brewing process or history of beer like it says on the website. At least the beer samples were good.

data.title: Asheville Brews Cruise is the best!!!!
data.text: We had a group of 35 on a corporate retreat weekend. They allowed us to use our own bus and we had the most knowledgable guide...Zach (aka tall stew) was AWESOME!!! They knew the best breweries (French broad, hi wire and pisgah) to tour with a group our size. So knowledgeable and hilarious!  The beer was flowing and so were the jokes. We never felt rushed...an absolutely great tour. Zach even stayed with a few of us after the tour was over and took us to his favorite in- town brewery. Couldn't say enough good things about ABC. If you're trying to decide who to go with...these are your guys!!

data.title: Bachelor party success
data.text: We had a group of 10 guys and had an absolute blast. The samples were flowing and so was the information on each brewery. Zach, the owner, was our guide and he was a good time and very friendly. I will be back with friends.

data.title: Expected more
data.text: I expected more information and a tour of each brewery.  What we got was transportation between four different breweries and samples.  Very little info or behind-the-scenes touring.  They brought us into each site and then we drank samples (which we were told little about) and socialized with the others on the tour.  If we had brought along friends to hang out with, it might have been different.  The tour was supposed to end about 5:30 and our "tour guide" was not in any hurry (he was busy hanging out rather than giving us a tour) so we didn't finish until about 6:30.  It was a lot of beer samples, but it wasn't at all what I expected.

owner_response.author: Jeffery H, Owner at Asheville Brews Cruise, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello,

What tour did you cruise on with us? I would appreciate knowing because we hardly ever have had an unhappy customer and if something is being done wrong we like the feedback. Was this a recent cruise?  I'm confused as to who you are and when you took our tour. Thanks AshevilleLocal2016
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Brews cruise
data.text: This was the second time we went on the Brews Cruise and had a great time. We only went to 3 breweries this time. I'll admit I'm a slow drinker but it seemed the times between samples wasn't quite long enough. Our guide was very knowledgeable about beer and the Asheville area. I would definitely go again.

data.title: JC and Zach are awesome!!!!!!
data.text: These guys are great, if I could give them more stars, I would. We did a Friday tour and were able to get to 4 breweries. We had a group of 6  plus a couple we didn't know, but became friendly with right away. JC and Zach went above and beyond when one of our group members started to feel ill. Zac, the driver, offered to drive him back to our hotel about an hour into the trip, which he did. Some of these bad reviews talk about not getting a "tour" from a "tour guide" at each brewery. If you've never been on a brewery tour, this isn't for you. This is meant for you to see a few breweries and try their flagship brews without having to worry about transportation or driving while intoxicated. They are personable and have a wealth of knowledge for each brewery. We will definitely be coming back to use their services again.

data.title: Highly Recommend!
data.text: We enjoyed the brews cruise on the short bus with JC and Zack!  Great time!  Both are amazing hosts that know a lot about the beer scene in Asheville.   This tour was 4 breweries off the main path. The small group of 10 allowed was nice and easy to manage.   We will take this tour again next time we're in Asheville.

data.title: Must Try
data.text: Great activity for a girls weekend! The guides/owners are friendly and knowledgeable. This was our second time and it was just as good as the first.

data.title: An excellent way to spend the afternoon...
data.text: If you love beer, give this tour a try.  Four stops with samples provided.  Some beer tours are a little skimpy on the pours, but not this one.  If you want to try a sample of something other than what is provided, just ask.  JC was a superb host.  Highly recommended.

data.title: Brewery Tour
data.text: To start JC and Zack are amazing hosts.  The tour started on time and meandered through four breweries.  We never felt rushed to leave for the next destination.  They discussed facts about each place we went French Broad, Hi wire, Highland, and Pisgah.  Each stop allowed several beer flavors and a description of each.  I would recommend riding with these guys !  They are truly fun people to hang out with.

data.title: Fantastic tour
data.text: My wife and I had so much fun on this tour. The pace was relaxed and the guide was very knowledgeable. The breweries were welcoming and the beer fantastic. We will do the cruise EVERY time we come to Asheville.

data.title: Awesome tour
data.text:
Our guide was fantastic and very knowledgeable. I would definitely recommend this tour to anyone.  All of the breweries were great and the tour had just the right number of people.  

Keep up the good work!!!

data.title: Great time!
data.text: JC and Zach are not only great tour guides but successful businessmen. They know how to relate to all ages and make everyone feel that this was the best tour they ever had. I highly recommend!

data.title: Best brewery tour!
data.text: Really enjoyed the entire tour. Learned so much.  Everyone on the tour had a blast. Tour guide was excellent. This is the tour to take.

data.title: Well worth your time!
data.text: Thanks JC and Zack for a great cruise!  JC was a great guide! We've been drinking beer for a long time and I still learned things!  It was so great to not have to worry about driving to all the breweries, Zack took care of us.  You can tell that these guys really like what they are doing.  Best of luck!

data.title: best tour guide ever
data.text: i used to drive for Brews Cruise and JC is the best!! he knows great facts about Asheville and he knows how to relate to everyone!  i wish that i had JC's people skills

data.title: Good times
data.text: We had a lot of fun visiting Asheville and taking the cruise. Many great beers to choose from at our stops and all of them great tasting!
